mapper.select: select city_name from cus_city where city_name=#{cityName}

SELECT cc.city_name,cc.province_id,STATUS,cc.city_id, cp. cityProvinceId,cp.province_name FROM cus_city cc INNER JOIN (SELECT province_id AS cityProvinceId,province_name FROM cus_province)cp ON cc.province_id=cp.cityProvinceId WHERE cc.`status`!=-1
mapper.update: update cus_city set city_name=#{cityName}, province_id=#{provinceId}, status=#{status} where city_id = #{cityId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cus_city WHERE cus_city.`status`!=-1 and cus_city.`status`!=0
